title: Large number of Graded T206 cards for sale - Most are SGC
author: Cy2009

posts.post_title: Large number of Graded T206 cards for sale - Most are SGC
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I have a large number of graded T206 cards for sale. Most are SGC graded and are very nice for the grade. If you would like to see what I have, click the following link.

[url]http://www.cyscards.com/t206.htm[/url]

I am not interested in trades at this time. if you would like to buy any of these, my E-mail address is: [url]cy@cyscards.com[/url]

Thanks.

Cy
[url]www.cyscards.com[/url]
I just wanted to give Cy a glowing endorsement.  I have dealt with him before, and he is top notch!!

I second that, Rob.  Cy is a pro when it comes to customer service.

Best,

Andy

[quote name="Robextend" post=800129]I just wanted to give Cy a glowing endorsement.  I have dealt with him before, and he is top notch!![/QUOTE]
I third that! he is one of the best to deal with!    Marc :)
email sent on T206 Sam Strang (the $60 card)

I fourth that.  He helped me out quite a bit on my '54 Topps set.  

Also, email sent on a few.

Thanks!

David

PM sent on the Stahl.

Rawn

Hi Cy

I have sent you an email regarding the T206s of Adkins, Hartsel and Delehanty.

Thanks

Jantz

Hello Cy-

Email sent on Mike Donlin seated.

Thanks!!

Sincerely,Clayton

Hi Cy

I have sent another email to you. There are two more T206s (Sharpe & Lake NY) on your list that I'm interested in buying. Please let me know if they are still available.

Thanks

Jantz
If you're looking for one of the good guys in the hobby Cy is it.

Hi,

This is a bump to let you know that my web-site has been updated and the T206 and T205 cards available are posted on my web-site. 

Take a look. You may find something that you like.

Link to my T206 cards for sale: [url]http://www.cyscards.com/t206.htm[/url]

Link to my T205 cards for sale: [url]http://www.cyscards.com/t205.htm[/url]

If you would like to buy any of these T206 or T205 cards, you can send me an E-mail at: [url]cy@cyscards.com[/url]

Thanks.

Cy
[url]www.cyscards.com[/url]

Cy, just wanted to say that in the brief time I've been here I've enjoyed looking through the stuff on your site.  There's definately some there that I'd like and I'm sure I'll be buying from you in the future even though I can't yet.  Good luck with your sales. :)

posts.post_title: I am interested in three of your T206s.
posts.post_content: I sent you an-email on three cards (Krause-pitching, Covaleski & Seymour-batting) I'd like to purchase.
